name: Coris
long_description:
Coris is the AI platform for payments risk and operations. We work with the most ambitious companies around the globe such as GoFundMe, Kajabi, Clio and Cherry to automate merchant onboarding, monitoring, and payment operations. What risk teams only imagined two years ago, Coris is delivering today with our risk platform and AI agents.

We’re backed by Y Combinator, Lux Capital, Pathlight Ventures, and other world-class investors — and we’re just getting started !
one_liner: AI risk and ops platform for Payment Processors, Banks, SaaS…
